path.description: The path at which to create the component file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the component in the project root.

name.description: The name of the action that the execution view will perform.
name.x-prompt: What is the name of the action?

entityType.description: The name of the entity type to be perfromed.
entityType.x-prompt: What is the name of the entity type to be performed?

namespace.description: The namespace of the entity type.

style.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files, or 'none' to skip generating the style file.
